mods.name: Ballistic Coprocessor
mods.desc: If a shot misses, 50% chance to reroll that shot. Says 'Ricochet hit' upon hit.

mods.name: Smart Link
mods.desc: For Smart Ranged Weapons, accuracy defaults to 100% but crit rate drops to 0%.

mods.name: Pretty Tattoo
mods.desc: Increase Intimidation by 1. Adds +1 Hands slot.

mods.name: Scratchers
mods.desc: Unarmed damage is increased by 10%. Critical chance for unarmed damage increases by 10%.

mods.name: Rippers
mods.desc: Unarmed damage is increased by 15%. Critical chance for unarmed damage increases by 20%. Requires Gorilla Arms.

mods.name: Wolvers
mods.desc: Critical chance for unarmed damage increases by 20%. Crit damage is boosted by 20%. Requires Gorilla Arms.

mods.name: Big Knucks
mods.desc: Unarmed damage calculation is static, can no longer crit, and is always scaled to the attack’s damage ceiling. Requires Gorilla Arms.

mods.name: Slice N’ Dice
mods.desc: Unarmed damage is increased by 25%. Critical hits for unarmed damage now cause Bleed.

mods.name: Carbon Knuckles
mods.desc: Unarmed damage is increased by 25%. Unarmed Critical chance is now 100%.
